requirements.summary: Create a child-friendly robot character interface
acceptanceCriteria: Robot character is visually displayed on screen
Design is age-appropriate and welcoming for children
Robot has a distinct visual identity that supports the learning context

file_operations.description: Create RobotCharacter component displaying the generated robot image (frontend/public/assets/generated/robot-character.dim_512x512.png) with animated states (idle, listening, speaking) and child-friendly visual presentation
Wire RobotCharacter component into the main app view as the central conversational interface element

requirements.summary: Implement voice input functionality for children to speak English
acceptanceCriteria: Children can activate voice recording through the interface
Spoken audio is captured and converted to text
Voice input works reliably for child speech patterns

file_operations.description: Create custom hook using browser Web Speech API (SpeechRecognition) to capture voice input, handle start/stop recording, and return transcribed text without external services
Create VoiceInput component with a large, child-friendly microphone button that uses useSpeechRecognition hook to capture spoken English and display transcription status
Integrate VoiceInput component below RobotCharacter and wire voice transcription results to conversation flow

requirements.summary: Display correction feedback in a clear, encouraging manner
acceptanceCriteria: Corrections are presented in child-friendly language
Feedback highlights the mistake and provides the correct form
Tone is educational and supportive rather than critical

file_operations.description: Create CorrectionFeedback component to display corrections with visual highlighting of mistakes, supportive language, and clear presentation of correct forms using friendly typography and encouraging messaging
Wire CorrectionFeedback component to display correction data from ConversationTurn.correction field when present in robot responses

requirements.summary: Implement conversation flow with robot responses and corrections
acceptanceCriteria: Robot provides conversational responses after each user input
Dialogue feels natural and maintains context
Corrections are integrated into the conversational flow

file_operations.description: Create ConversationHistory component to display the conversation log retrieved from backend.getConversationLog(), showing user inputs, robot responses, and inline corrections in a scrollable chat-like interface
Create custom hook to manage conversation state, call backend.processInput() with user transcriptions, fetch conversation log, and handle loading/error states

Wire useConversation hook to orchestrate the conversation flow: send voice input to backend via processInput(), update ConversationHistory with results, and trigger RobotCharacter visual state changes

requirements.summary: Apply playful, educational design theme for children
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design is cohesive across all screens
Color palette is vibrant and age-appropriate
Layout supports easy navigation for young users

file_operations.description: Add child-friendly global styles with bright, vibrant color palette, rounded corners, playful shadows, and large font sizes suitable for young learners while maintaining readability
Extend Tailwind theme with custom colors (bright primary, cheerful secondary, encouraging success green), larger spacing scale, and playful font configurations for educational context
Apply cohesive layout structure with centered robot character, clear visual hierarchy, and child-friendly spacing using the custom theme tokens from Tailwind configuration
